description: Settings optimized for Rock music, providing punchy lows, scooped mids for guitar thickness, and bright highs.

bands.notes: Slight boost for foundational bass and rumble, giving weight to the overall sound.
Strong boost for kick drum punch and bass guitar thickness.
Boost for low-end body and warmth, essential for powerful drums and bass.
Neutral or slight cut; too much here can make the rhythm section muddy.
Mid-range cut to 'scoop' the sound, creating a heavier, more aggressive, and less 'honky' guitar tone.
Small cut to maintain the scoop effect and prevent the core frequencies from becoming too dominant.
Boost for guitar presence and attack, helping electric guitars cut through the mix.
Boost for vocal and snare drum clarity/snap.
Boost for cymbal clarity and high-end air, adding sparkle to the track.
